meta.article_title: September 21, 2020 - Against a Fast Attacker, Make At Least Two Strong Shots

against_a_fast_attacker_make_at_least_tw.probleme: Playing someone with a fast attack or quick blocks

debutant: Make two strong shots; slow down first shot to prepare for second

exercices_complementaires.description: Deep on the table; sets up second shot; throws off timing or jams backhand

erreurs_a_eviter: Aggressive blocking; losing timing or jamming backhand
